body: Wow this was really good and shocked at the end they didn't have a foursome

They have been thinking about each other for the past 5 years. And the girl has been waiting for him in the old apartment for the 5 years. The girl named her dog same name as mc so that she can keep calling mc’s name everyday. So as fate would have it, he visited the partment on that day due to nostalgia, and she happens to bring her dog out. Her dog ran away from her towards mc, and she called out mc’s name to stop it, and it stops mc in his track. That caused the both of them to see each other again finally. So we can assume that they will get together after that.
I’m so confused on the ending
